website_summaries.verdict: A favorite hardwood floor cleaner for many people, but it may not work as well on some floors.
pros: Works on all kinds of hardwood floor types, from laminate to bamboo
Many also adore the Bona mop and microfiber cloth you can buy separately
After you purchase one spray bottle, you can buy the 128 oz
cons: For best results, don't use too much
Some say it dulls bamboo floors

customer_reviews.title: Get Bono
customer_reviews.text: Been using Bono 13 years. My floor always look shinny. Have MS I can do it myself.
customer_reviews.author: karen Lynch

customer_reviews.title: I won’t use any other brand
customer_reviews.text: Bona is my go-to brand for cleaning my hardwood floors. I once tried another name brand and I ended up with a horrible film that turned my floors gray. It took a lot of effort to get them back to their original color and state. I will never use anything but Bona again.
customer_reviews.author: Debra D.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than water
customer_reviews.text: My housekeeper had been using water to clean the wood floors so I started looked for a mild cleaning solution. Read lots of great reviews on Bona so I purchased. The difference is noticeable. The floors have a nice shine and aren't sticky. Just wish it was a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sholden7

customer_reviews.title: great for heavy duty cleaning
customer_reviews.text: moved into an apartment with absolutely disgusting wood floors. Whenever I would walk on it my feet would turn black. I used this product as well as a rag and a cleaning brush. It worked very well and now I’m not scared or grossed out walking on my floors! The pictures are before and afters from cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: fwk

customer_reviews.title: Solid product - I buy it regularly
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cleaning my bamboo floors. I use it all the time for minor spills or spots. I have used it to clean an entire floor, but I find vinegar and water do better on a big job like that.
customer_reviews.author: brye

customer_reviews.title: Bona is the BEST cleaning product for wood.
customer_reviews.text: We had a carpenter working on the house and he recommended Bona...it's a bit hard to find (HD/Lowes) so I was happy to find it on Amazon by this seller! It is definitely the BEST wood cleaner because it's gentle but cleans very well and leaves wood floors and surfaces very shiny. Spray on wood stairs or furniture and it wipes off very cleanly no residue. They also have a mop kit for wood floors that sprays as you go and wipes up easy...can do several rooms without replacing the cloth mop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the previous formula
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I have ordered this product from Amazon. The 1st product was great. I ordered this cleaned again because it is supposed to be non-toxic, but it smells like amonia.
customer_reviews.author: gbggg

customer_reviews.title: A must have for real wood floors
customer_reviews.text: We have beautiful oak floors, and this has helped bring them back to life.
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: great on my laminate flooring
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered before, great on my laminate flooring...easy to use, no streaking and doesn't spot. Quick and Easy ....
customer_reviews.author: Mickyshell

customer_reviews.title: Good floor cleaner but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good floor cleaner, but not a 5 start product for me. Its certainly easy to apply to your floors and provides a rich, conditioning shine but also tends to leave streaks if you do not thoroughly buff the product with a decent amount of pressure on your floor mop. I also find that you need to apply it pretty heavily to get a uniform look, a simply spritz and you'll find that the resulting droplets absorb before you can polish the surface. I'll be trying other products before making any bulk purchases of this to clean my floors.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaner for wood floors
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner works great for wood floors! The wood floors at our house that we rent are very old, with plenty of scratches and grime (at least when we moved in). The cleaner has done a nice job in brightening up the old floors and bringing some life back into them.
customer_reviews.author: IUhoosier10

customer_reviews.title: Finally a streak free wood cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a hardwood floor cleaner that doesn’t leave any streaks. I have such a hard time cleaning the floor especially with a dog. With my last cleaner you could always see streaks with the reflection of the light and it just didn’t work well. I would always get a greasy residue with streaks all over the place. I bought the stuff on Amazon and it works great. No more streaks no more greasy residue only a nice clean floor. I attached a picture where I just use the cleaner and you can’t see one streak.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye Cleaner Residue
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a couple of different brands of hardwood floor cleaners and they have left a film on my floors. This Bona cleaner removed almost all of the residue and my floors are gleaming again. It took a couple of hours and I have more to do but I am very pleased with the results so far. I will be buying this product in a bigger size when I need a refill.
customer_reviews.author: R. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: No STREAKS, EVER !
customer_reviews.text: It was a professional house cleaner that showed me this. My floor isnt real wood, but it is the appearance of and everything I used left streaks. Even to use Mop and Glo. No mixing with water, spread this with a clean rag, and your floors will shine brand new !
customer_reviews.author: Christy Continued

customer_reviews.title: Its a wonderful product. Thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: My honecare worker uses it at her home and then recommended it to me.im very happy with it. My caregiver stands by this brand so do I. I love how clean and shiny my floors look.im very happy.she uses it 1 -2 times a week and 1 bottle might last a few months tht way. I wish the price was like 4 dollars. Maybe I will take my business to Costco, more bang for ur buck so to speak lol
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Bona Hardwood Floor Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is non-toxic but I didn't like the white waxy film it left on my floor. To add to that the chairs are now leaving marks when they are moved across the floor, by scraping off the white film. Any hints on removing the film, would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: her-b

customer_reviews.title: I could have used plain water and got the same result
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a hardwood floor that had a light layer of black soot forming on it. The formula did not wipe this off the floor. I sprayed plain water in one section of the floor and got the same result. I scrubbed hard with this formula and only got an average cleaning experience. I will keep the bottle however because the nozzle has an impressive spray range. Maybe one star for the bottle?
customer_reviews.author: Mrinalini Upadhya

customer_reviews.title: Left a film...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product. I'm constantly trying to get doggy prints off my kitchen/dining floor. Bona is a good name in floor care so was hoping this was "it." It left a hazy film that didn't come off until I washed the floor with vinegar and water. I'll try in another room and maybe I did something wrong, but I was a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lini

customer_reviews.title: Best hardwood floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Working in the flooring industry this is the best product for your hardwood floors. No residue and safe to use on your floor if you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: I used this on an old wooden staircase and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: We cleaned the 50 year old wooden stairs and the wood looked old, there were white streaks, and the varnish is 1/2 off. I used this product and the wood now has a mellow glow. It is great! The wood turned out much better than my expectations and it is not slippery or slimy or oily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, wouldn’t use any other product on my wood floors
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I have used this for 10 years, this is a safe effective way of cleaning your wood floors, I would never take a chance on my wood floors with any cleaners that could permanently change the beauty of the wood. I am a home builder I recommend this product to all my clients.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Not working for stain
customer_reviews.text: I have a high hope for this product, I have an oak wood floor that have some stains on it and it bothers me. I tried using this to clean the stain, it doesn't work. I scrubbed and scrubbed, and it still there. So now, I just use it to clean a floor in general.
customer_reviews.author: Yessie Susanto

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was formulated to do
customer_reviews.text: Have used Bona before for my hardwood floors, and will continue to buy. No streaking or extra effort needed to clean our flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too harsh
customer_reviews.text: This stripped the sheen from my 80 year old hardwood floors. I'm glad I only used it on a small area. Would never use again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Safe, but not fully effective
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is safe for hardwood floors. I did not like that it never seemed to remove all the dirt, and it did not leave the floors shinny.
customer_reviews.author: Jaan

customer_reviews.title: Use this on my Mohawk hardwoods and I'm pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Use this on my Mohawk hardwoods and I'm pleased with the product. We bought a nice microfiber mop and spray on the mop, not the floor
customer_reviews.author: Kasey D

customer_reviews.title: Leaks when spraying
customer_reviews.text: The product came with defected spray nozzle, constant leaking when pull the trigger
customer_reviews.author: Stone54

customer_reviews.title: Bona bottle wrapped in hefty plastic bag, but
customer_reviews.text: BUT, when I removed the bottle wrapped in plastic from the box, I could see that the bottle leaked in transit. Not a lot of liquid, but enough for me worry if it will leak onto the floor/shelf where I would place it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Good product bottle malfunction
customer_reviews.text: Product works but bottle tip did not work properly. Just falls off every time and leaves a puddle of of liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: My hardwoods floors look great
customer_reviews.text: I had never used the Bona Hardwood floor cleaner before but after having bamboo wood flooring put in my bathroom I thought I would give it a try. I am so glad I did. It is very easy to use; spray, use a microfiber pad and done. I really like this wood cleaner dries quickly with no residue or sticky feeling. My bamboo flooring looks so clean and shiny. This is a must for sure when cleaning hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: sahmof3

customer_reviews.title: best hard wood cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I love this for cleaning my hardwoods! Makes them shine and I like it a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product zero stars if I could. It did nothing to remove dirt from my wood floors. I would guess there's nothing but water in the bottle. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: The best for hardwood floors. Haven’t seen anything that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita5791

customer_reviews.title: Ensure product is secure before shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived 3/4 empty due to leaks in cap and plastic bag. Shipping box was soaked. The second, identical product arrived in same box o.k.
customer_reviews.author: Tom dudley

customer_reviews.title: Gentle but Effective Hardwood Floor Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This a great cleaner for hardwood floors. I live in a 1920's building with old wood floors and this non-abrasive cleaner is perfectly suited to them. It leaves floors shiny but not slippery, and gets out a lot of stubborn dried substances and stains. It's a must if you have wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Babette R. Hodis

customer_reviews.title: Really Effective!
customer_reviews.text: The spray bottle has two options: single stream or spray stream - the single stream helps to target specific areas where you might have gunk stuck on the floor. The cleaner smells nice and dried quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for wood floors. I have over 100 y.o. wood floors and want to maintain them. This product does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: C. Neukirch

customer_reviews.title: Best wood floor cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: Best wood floor cleaner there is! Cleans well, lightly scented and does not make floors slippery. Brightens floors without making them slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: this is the same wonderful stuff i had been using
customer_reviews.text: Used to be called pet spot remover, but after a lot of study and comparison, this is the same wonderful stuff i had been using, evidently just a label or marketing change. Love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chambliss

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best hardwood cleaner?
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a ton of cleaners for hardwood and by far this is the best. Cleans SO well and doesn't leave any streaks or damage the wood. I'll be a lifelong user!!
customer_reviews.author: Maddie T

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay for my floor. But not feeling very clean and shiny after use. Need to find another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dora

customer_reviews.title: Shiny hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: Just swifter it around after spraying on floor. Let it dry in a few minutes, then admire the glossy shine!
customer_reviews.author: Richard from St Louis

customer_reviews.title: It shines your pathway.
customer_reviews.text: It cleans and treat your wood floors the way you need it. I highlyrecommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mario G.

customer_reviews.title: Made Oak Floors Look Good Again
customer_reviews.text: Great cleaner for 70 year old hardwood floors, brought th' SHINE back!
customer_reviews.author: Torretto

customer_reviews.title: Bona Hardwood Floor Cleaner Spray, 32 oz
customer_reviews.text: Works very well on our hardwood flooring and we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore S.

customer_reviews.title: Effectively cleans and drys fast
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cleaner. I found other floor cleaning products caused residuals so you saw foot marks when you walked on it. Bona effectively cleans and is fast drying. I use it twice a week and my floors look great afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: AGL

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: The spray isn't good would be better if can use it to spray stronger then just mist.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Great floor cleaning for pets and young children
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great shipping, and great doing business with you.
customer_reviews.author: Big guy in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Cleans wooden floors with ease!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on wood floors using micro cloths or microcloth mop
customer_reviews.author: diplock

customer_reviews.title: Best floor cleaner ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this floor cleaner, works like a charm. I love that its a spray and I can can just do spot cleans when needed.
customer_reviews.author: B Collins

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for wood floors!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our wood floors. Goes on nicely. Not greasy or slippery. Floors look as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Scherzinger

customer_reviews.title: The best one I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Does the job. Leaves the floors clean and with a shine.
customer_reviews.author: J Joy S

customer_reviews.title: No streaks
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bona floor cleaners . This wood floor cleaner doesn't leave streaks or have a milky residue like others I've tried. Just wish it had a lite fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: meyersheri51

customer_reviews.title: Great leaner for hard wood floor.
customer_reviews.text: The smell is not offensive. I have allergies and this cleaner does not bother me. It cleans well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Seville

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Wipes up very easily and leaves no residue. Happy that it removes spots from the floor where something spilled or dropped and wasn’t caught right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stalberger

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite hardwood floor cleaner. It does an awesome job! I am really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: beautiful floors
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser is wonderful..We just installed bamboo flooring...and it cleans deep, and makes them shine beautifully..thank you.!
customer_reviews.author: Carol DeMato

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with Bona.
customer_reviews.text: My floors look great after using this product. The company who sold me my wood flooring had recommended that I use Bona.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without leaving foggy wood floor
customer_reviews.text: My previous wood cleaner left foggy marks on the floor which looks very ugly. Since then I hadn’t bought any floor cleaner and gave Bona a chance after neighbors recommendations. And couldn’t be happier. It’s easy to spray and mopped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sterile but great shine
customer_reviews.text: I do not see how it “cleans” the floor. This is only for a floor shine. I feel like it is misleading to be sterile but for some reason it does not give off “Swifter Wet Jet/Mop” or any other sterile, clorox hard wood floor cleansers. Won’t be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Tushina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: 1st time trying the hardwood floor cleaner and we love it leaves floors clean and looking brand new . No residue Build up . Best cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Joe Scocimara

customer_reviews.title: Best Floor Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat Bona when it comes to cleaning hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for hardwood floors. Easy to use. Received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Bonas’s So easy!  And fast and shines!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bonas’s So easy! And fast and shines!!! Excellent product. Love the Bona mop too!!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Homaychak

customer_reviews.title: Pure solution
customer_reviews.text: It's pure, so I recommend to dilute 50/50 with water so the floor does not stay sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Adames

customer_reviews.title: Best hardwood floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleans hardwoods without dulling finish. I have used this product for years on my floors. Wouldn’t use anything else
customer_reviews.author: YoMomma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product is the only thing I will use on my hardwood floors. You just squirt it on the floor and damp mop. It leaves a nice shine. Really like it!
customer_reviews.author: mary burnham

customer_reviews.title: Best cleaner for your hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner doesn't leave a wax coating on your floors like most cleaners. This is the best cleaner to use on your hardwood floors
customer_reviews.author: Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This spray works on my hardwood floors, cleaning them well. The only exception is removing adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Ileen Falk

customer_reviews.title: best hardwood floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: only cleaner that got my old hardwood floors clean and shining again
customer_reviews.author: Heather Haack

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job but the applicator spray bottle is difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like the result but...it is hard to spray repeatedly, which you must do.
customer_reviews.author: Gratia Karmes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my new floors!
customer_reviews.text: This was the only product that didn't leave streaks on my new engineered hardwood floors. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Works well but really spreadable
customer_reviews.text: With a well but a little hard to spread around.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Toribio

customer_reviews.title: Best Hardwood Floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: As a family we have been using BONA hardwood cleaner for years. And I am confident to say that you will not be disappointed from the results you will achieve with this cleaner. Give yourself a try!
customer_reviews.author: Corey tataryan

customer_reviews.title: Greatest wood floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this floor cleaner for our new wood floors a year ago and it not only cleans the floors safely, but leaves a lovely luster. there is never any build-up of any wax or oily residue, etc., The mop that came with this, as a set, is also of high quality. It is machine washable and comes out in perfect condition every time. We've been using these products for a year now and I can recommend this highly to anyone with wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie Skies

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well.
customer_reviews.text: Works fairly well. Had some dry wall guys leave spackle in the floor and dried up so I had using this to clean it helped
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Uy Teoco Jr

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This product not only cleans your hardwood floors, it brings life to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Product for Wood Floors
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for years and absolutely love it. Just use a rag on hands & knees - so quick & easy. Very pleased to find it on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Juniperberry72

customer_reviews.title: it's alright. i prefer little water, vinegar, ...
customer_reviews.text: it's alright. i prefer little water, vinegar, and tiny bit of olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: NirHet

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Liked this product, I use it on my wood end tables too.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Jordan

customer_reviews.title: it sprays ...
customer_reviews.text: i dont see a difference in my floors, i still think water and soap will do the same as this spray.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Castañeda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This stuff leaves a cloudy film on my wood floors !!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Great hardwood cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always used Bona on our hardwood floors. Our builder recommended it 24 years ago. It’s a great cleaner that we can depend on.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've used this floor cleaner for many years. Works great and leaves no residue. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Gal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cleans and shines our wood floors
customer_reviews.text: We have some top quality wood floors in our home. Bona makes caring for them easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner for our new engineered click-lock wood flooring....
customer_reviews.text: Very fine product, but expect to do some work. Don't put on too much and be sure to work it well with a swiffer pad so that there is not a standing glob of the liquid, or it will harden and look terrible... I like it. It doesn't stink and seems to treat the wood very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Clean
customer_reviews.text: The best product I can buy for my floors. Love it
customer_reviews.author: MJMB

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my wood floors! Leaves them looking clean and with a shine!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Morgavio

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use spray head to spray directly onto the mop head or onto the hardwood floor directly. Also cleans the floor with no streaks & no after smell like some cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it. It didn't have the shine on my hardwood that I have been using -- BRUCE DURALUSTER FLOOR CLEANER. Only used it one time, and reordered the Bruce product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hardwood floor cleaner
customer_reviews.text: We tried everything and then this. Nothing more to say. Its the best. Buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Ask for padding for this product. Mine arrived and had leaked inside the box
customer_reviews.text: The product was not cushioned at all and arrived with some leakage

customer_reviews.text: Great hard wood floor cleaner, no residue and leaves floors shiny

customer_reviews.text: This is what I use on our floors all the time and love it

product_meta.title: Bona Hardwood Floor Cleaner Spray, 32 oz
product_meta.description: Size:32 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Style:OriginalFlooring contractors agree, when looking for the best to care for hardwood floors use Bona Hardwood Floor Cleaner. The residue-free, fast drying solution cleans hardwood floors by gently and effectively removing dust, dirt and grime to reveal the floor's natural shine and beauty. Waterbased solutions and GREENGUARD GOLD certification ensure a safe product for your family, pets and our planet.
feature_bullets: Safe for all unwaxed, unoiled, polyurethane finished wood floors
Waterbased cleaning formula dries fast, is residue-free, and safe for people, pets and the planet
GREENGUARD GOLD certified – very low VOC emissions

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,261 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
